file.name: swagger5.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.0
info:
  version: 1.0.0
  title: Azure GreenAI Carbon-Intensity API
  description: >-
    An API to associate Azure regions to WattTime balancing authorities, to
    return carbon intensity data
externalDocs:
  url: 'http://azure-uw-cli-2021.azurewebsites.net/'
  description: Link back to the GreenAI Carbon Intensity API
tags:
  - name: search
    description: Methods for finding WattTime balancing authority
  - name: data
    description: Pulling data directly from WattTime
paths:
  /getloc:
    get:
      tags:
        - search
      summary: Finds corresponding balancing authority of an Azure region
      description: ''
      parameters:
        - name: AZ_Region
          in: query
          required: true
          description: Name of Azure region
          schema:
            type: string
      responses:
        '200':
          description: Success
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/loc_resp'

  /from_ba:
    get:
      tags:
        - search
      summary: Finds nearest Azure region for a given balancing authority
      description: ''
      parameters:
        - name: BA_name
          in: query
          required: true
          description: Balancing authority name
          schema:
            type: string
      responses:
        '200':
          description: Success
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/from_ba_resp'
  /get_grid_data:
    get:
      tags:
        - data
      summary: >-
        Returns marginal grid data for a given balancing authority and time
        period
      description: ''
      parameters:
        - name: ba
          in: query
          required: true
          description: Balancing Authority (WattTime format, contains underscores)
          schema:
            type: string
        - name: starttime
          in: query
          required: true
          description: Starting time (ISO8601 format)
          schema:
            type: string
        - name: endtime
          in: query
          required: true
          description: Ending time (ISO8601 format)
          schema:
            type: string
      responses:
        '200':
          description: Success
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/grid_data_resp'
  /get_index_data:
    get:
      tags:
        - data
      summary: Returns real-time data for a given balancing authority and time period
      description: ''
      parameters:
        - name: ba
          in: query
          required: true
          description: Balancing Authority (WattTime format, contains underscores)
          schema:
            type: string
      responses:
        '200':
          description: Real-time ba data
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/index_data_resp'
  /get_forecast_data:
    get:
      tags:
        - data
      summary: >-
        Returns marginal forecast data for a given balancing authority and time
        period
      description: ''
      parameters:
        - name: ba
          in: query
          required: true
          description: Balancing Authority (WattTime format, contains underscores)
          schema:
            type: string
        - name: starttime
          in: query
          required: false
          description: Starting time (ISO8601 format)
          schema:
            type: string
        - name: endtime
          in: query
          required: false
          description: Ending time (ISO8601 format)
          schema:
            type: string
      responses:
        '200':
          description: forecast data
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/forecast_data_resp'
  /get_historical_data:
    get:
      tags:
        - data
      summary: Returns historical data for a given balancing authority
      description: ''
      parameters:
        - name: ba
          in: query
          required: true
          description: Balancing Authority
          schema:
            type: string
      responses:
        '200':
          description: Historical ba data
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/historical_data_resp'
  /shift_predictions:
    get:
      tags:
        - data
      summary: >-
        Finds the greenest start time for GPU runs shifted either by Geography or Time.
      description: ''
      parameters:
        - name: data_shifter
          in: query
          required: true
          description: Either "Geographic Shift Only" or "Time Shift Only"
          schema:
            type: string
        - name: data_az
          in: query
          required: true
          description: Azure Region of interest
          schema:
            type: string
        - name: starttime
          in: query
          required: false
          description: Earliest Start Time (ISO8601 format). Only for Time Shift method.
          schema:
            type: string
        - name: endtime
          in: query
          required: false
          description: Last Possible Start Time (ISO8601 format). Only for Time Shift method.
          schema:
            type: string
      responses:
        '200':
          description: Success
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/shift_resp'
components:
  schemas:
    loc_resp:
      properties:
        abbrev:
          type: string
        id:
          type: string
        name:
          type: string
    shift_resp:
      properties:
        shiftAZ:
          type: string
        shift_perc:
          type: string
        shiftDateTime:
          type: string
    from_ba_resp:
      properties:
        AZ_Region:
          type: string
        abbrev:
          type: string
        id:
          type: string
        latitude:
          type: string
        longitude:
          type: string
        name:
          type: string
    grid_data_resp:
      type: array
      items:
          type: object
          properties:
            point_time:
              type: string
            value:
              type: number
            frequency:
              type: number
            market:
              type: string
            ba:
              type: string
            datatype:
              type: string
            version:
              type: string
    index_data_resp:
      properties:
        freq:
          type: string
        ba:
          type: string
        percent:
          type: string
        moer:
          type: string
        point_time:
          type: string
    forecast_data_resp:
      properties:
        generated_at:
          type: string
        forecast:
          type: array
          items:
            type: object
            properties:
              point_time:
                type: string
              value:
                type: integer
              version:
                type: string
              ba:
                type: string
    historical_data_resp: {}
